snippet.title: A Sci-Fi survival Game where you build your Train - Heat Death: Exodus
snippet.description:
Heat Death is a sci-fi survival game where your train is your shelter, weapon, and vehicle to uncover the mysteries of a frozen world.

Join our discord server to share your thoughts and comments with us and get beta versions of the game: 
https://discord.gg/WH8RCvcnUQ
* Early members of our Discord server will receive a special gift on the final version’s launch on Steam!

You can also download the latest prologue version from Itch.io:
https://massgamedev.itch.io/heat-death-prologue

Gameplay: 
In this game, you will explore a vast map with different biomes and weather conditions, craft and customize your train with various compartments and attachments, survive deadly storms and hostile bots and drones, and discover the planet’s secrets. Heat Death is being developed using Unreal Engine 5 and offers stunning graphics.

Environment:
Heat Death takes place on an Eyeball planet, which is tidally locked to its star. One side of the planet always faces the star, and the other is always dark! Your journey is to travel to the dark side of this planet!
